plains.name: Plains
plains.lore: The Plains are vast open grasslands dotted with small villages and ponds, home to many wandering creatures and travelers.

pond.name: Pond
pond.lore: A quiet pond surrounded by reeds and wildflowers, a peaceful spot teeming with fish and small animals.

village_1.name: Village 1
village_1.lore: A humble village where travelers rest and villagers live simple lives.

meadow.name: Meadow
meadow.lore: A large meadow full of wildflowers and roaming wildlife.

well.name: Well
well.lore: An old stone well providing fresh water to nearby villages.

church.name: Church
church.lore: A stone church with stained glass windows, a place of worship and community.

village_2.name: Village 2
village_2.lore: A larger, bustling village with markets and a cathedral at its center.

cathedral.name: Cathedral
cathedral.lore: A grand cathedral towering over the village, filled with history and reverence.

market.name: Market
market.lore: A busy marketplace where traders and villagers exchange goods.
